title: Gangplank - Cannon Barrage - Cannot  upgrade with silver serpent coins
body: While playing the new Gangplank I was very excited to try the new Cannon Barrage. Once I reached the 500+ silver serpent coins I quickly found I was unable to to upgrade the ability to the new buyable upgrades. Please help. Without Gangplanks upgrades it feels like he has been uber nerfed.

replies.body: I could do it fine, idk why, buy I've played with two Gangplanks who couldn't. +1, hope for fix
Same problem, me and enemy GP couldn't upgrade our ults at all PLEASE FIX
Confirmed, the silver serpent coins cannot be spent. Please fix this asap.

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue.  There's a workaround currently where you can access the Silver Serpent upgrades by switching from the "Recommended" tab and finding the upgrades in the "All Items" tab.  You should be able to purchase the upgrades from the "All Items" section in this way.

I attempted this in my GP game, it still did not work. Could you be more specific? I used a search on the All Items page. Are there any other details you can share, such as anything to do with ult ranks/cd or gold amount? I've heard other people say they didn't have issues, and given that all items didn't work for me, I feel like I can't play GP at all right now. :\

Hmmm...  I've tried a variety of combinations (get 500 SS then buy, get 1500 then buy, get level 6 then buy, etc.) and the workaround has worked each time.  Just to clarify, is this the sequence you are following?:

1.  Play Gangplank
2.  Get 500 Silver Serpents
3.  Open Shop
4.  Observe that the "Recommended" upgrades are grayed out
5.  Click on the "All Items" tab
6.  Observe that the upgrades are now purchasable on the top row of your item grid together with the trinket choices.

Please also make sure that when you select the "All Items" tab, you don't have any filters checked in the store, otherwise the upgrades won't be visible.

If you do that sequence of events and still can't buy the upgrade, please let me know if anything stands out as different for you from what I've outlined.  I've tried a few different ways of getting to the upgrades, and the workaround has worked for me each time.  I hope that works!
